strapiPost.title: Hogs Upset No. 1 Auburn At Home
strapiPost.content:
Last night for the first time ever, Bud Walton Arena hosted a no. 1 ranked team as Auburn squared off against the unranked Arkansas mens basketball team - let's just say it went well.

  • Records broken: Arkansas Basketball is 1-11 against a no. 1 ranked opponent. Their lone victory was in 1984 against University of North Carolina and their all-star, Michael Jordan. The Hogs are now 2-11 as they took out SEC rival Auburn in an overtime thriller.
  • 20,327: The number of attendees at last night's game, setting a record for the most people in Bud Walton Arena, ever. Notably, the Hogs extended their winning streak to 9 games, including 8 straight SEC games.
